nodes.text: Empire vs Empire: Disloyalty is a scenario for Star Wars Miniatures: Legacy of the Force written by Sterling Hershey, that was added to Wizards.com on May 6, 2008.
Early in the Second Imperial Civil War, a group of soldiers loyal to Emperor Roan Fel are attempting to escape Coruscant. One Sith troops are sent to destroy them.
"Empire vs. Empire: Disloyalty" on Wizards.com (content now obsolete; backup link)
